ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class CommentModel

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.AModel<AView>
      ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.CommentModel

public class CommentModel
extends AModel<AView>

CommentModel is the actual model for each and every comment. This holdsall the data about a single comment for references later in the use of the program.

Method Detail

setES

public void setES(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String parent,
                  java.lang.String type)
Sets the ElasticSearch ID for the comment. This string is used for storing and retrieving the comment from elasisearch. It is also useful to determine if two comment objects are the same.

Parameters:
id - The id of the comment.
parent - The parent of the comment.
type - The type of comment.

isTopLevel

public boolean isTopLevel()
Checks to see if the comment is top level or not.

Returns:
mEsType.equals("TopLevel") Boolean if the comment is top level or not.

getmEsID

public java.lang.String getmEsID()
This function gets the elastisearch ID of the comment. Useful for determining if two comment objects are the same or for elastisearch operations.

Returns:
mEsID The ID of the ElasticSearch

setmEsID

public void setmEsID(java.lang.String mEsID)
Sets the elastisearch ID of the comment.

Parameters:
mEsID - The ElasticSearch ID for the comment.

getmParentID

public java.lang.String getmParentID()
Gets the comments parent ID. Since comments do not keep a list of their children this field allows you to find the children of a comment by searching for all comments who's mParentID field == parent EsID.

Returns:
mParentID The ID of the comment's parent.

setmParentID

public void setmParentID(java.lang.String mParentID)
Sets the parent's ID to that of another parent ID. Used to link a comment to a parent.

Parameters:
mParentID - The ID of the comment's parent.

getmEsType

public java.lang.String getmEsType()
Gets the ElasticSearch type of comment. Will return either "TopLevel" or "ReplyLevel".

Returns:
mEsType The type of comment from ElasticSearch.

setmEsType

public void setmEsType(java.lang.String mEsType)
Sets the type of comment. Anything other than "TopLevel" or "ReplyLevel" will have un defined application behaviour. This function does not sanitise input.

Parameters:
mEsType - The type of comment.

getmBody

public java.lang.String getmBody()

Returns:
The authors profile id

setmGeolocation

public void setmGeolocation(Location geolocation)
Sets the geolocation for the comment. Used mostly when making a new comment however can be used to re-define the location for a comment.

Parameters:
geolocation - The geolocation to be set.

setmGeolocation

public void setmGeolocation(double lat,
                            double lon)
Sets the geolocation for the comment given longitude and latitude. Allows one to set the location of a comment view lat and long directly.

Parameters:
lat - The latitude for the comment.
lon - The longitude for the comment.
